description:
LGR's home was crushed by two massive trees after Hurricane Helene ravaged his hometown of Asheville, NC. Let's make some good happen after this tragedy!

Donate to Red Cross: https://www.redcross.org/donate/dr/hurricane-helene.html/
Support LGR on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/LazyGameReviews
Support Novaspirit Tech on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/novaspirittech
title: An Update on LGR
